title: Hour 2 - Mike Florio (06-15-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Mike Florio (06-15-20)
description:
Mike Florio says to Dan that as soon as you put the name Colin Kaepernick on a NFL team jersey; it will become the number 1 selling jersey in the league. Mike says as soon as Colin signs with a NFL team; that team will have and immediate following.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
